page.title: 12FASHION
page.content: parents,3 let there parents decide. {FAVOURITE CLOTHES BAGGIES}Tapered trousers with narrow bottoms often with studs or zips.{FLURESCENT SOCKS } Luminous colours like ORANGE,PINK and LIME GREEN often worn odd.{SPORTS TOP} Tops with hoods.{TRAINERS}ADIDAS,NIKE HI-TEC running shoes in coloured fabrics. { { 1980's POEM by N.STENE.} My mum won't let me play with my brother.---Nor my Bigfoot or my dad's Hover.---My mum won't let me watch T.V She does'nt like Street Hawk you see, Grange Hill I do like best.---B.M.X's are pretty neat.---Fluresant gloves are hard to beat.---She said she does'nt have the cash,She said they were a load trash--- when I become a parent at last---I'll nag my children and forget the past.
